definition: regardless of what's before or after (idiom); rushing blindly into sth
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: He handled affairs disregard the procedure.
When I came to prison, I dove into Buddhism headfirst .
sentences.chinese: 當我來到監獄的時候，我不顧前後地埋首於佛學。
